outputs.output_descr: SIGNIFICANT OPPORTUNITIES FOR INCOME GENERATION AND EMPLOYMENT CREATION EXIST IN THE AGRICULTURAL AND RURAL SECTORES.  hOWEVER, TO TRANSLATE THESE OPPORTUNITIES INTO REALITY, BOLD MEASURES ARE REQUIRED.  iN PARTICULAR, TARGETED EFFORTS ARE REQUIRED TO TRANSFORM AGRICULTURAL PRACTICES FROM A LOW PRODUCTIVITY TRADITIONAL SYSTEM TO HIGH VALUE INTEGRATED AGRO-ENTERPRISES.  IN TRANSFORMING THE SECTOR, A NEW CADRE OF AGRI-ENTREPRENEURS WITH NEW SKILLS AND GLOBAL MARKET VISION ARE ALSO NEEDED.

project_descr: Development of Inclusive Markets - Support to  Micro Finance and Enterpreneurship development.
